definition: waste of manpower and resources
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)

sentences.english: Critics say the dams are ecologically unsound white elephants.
sentences.chinese: 批评者说，大坝劳民伤财，又不利于生态环境。

to carry out large scale construction

to rejoice in grandiose deeds/to strive to achieve extraordinary things

to indulge in a life of luxury (idiom); extreme extravagance

to work hard while accomplishing little/to toil to no avail
